frontmatter.title: Contributing to Polaris React
frontmatter.description: Anyone is welcome to contribute to Polaris React components. There are several types of component contributions, but they typically fall under three categories; bug fix, enhancement, or new pattern.
keywords: how to add a prop type
how to add a new component

pageProps.seoDescription: Bug fixes can be as simple as removing a typo, or as complex as refactoring a component to address a performance or accessibility issue. Enhancements usually add to or update the props of an existing component to extend its functionality or presentation. New patterns can be contributed by simply adding a new example to an existing component’s documentation, or by adding new components or utilities. Often component contributions are a mix of these.
